item.title: I want to fly...
item.description: I guess even little kids need so diviation from the normal toys.. (read the reviews on that one).. a vibrating broom.. that all the children love to “ride” around. heh. ride. So I set up a DVD sharing system. it is gunna be pretty sweet. whee. hehe. check it out here. It is a private system, but if you want access and are in the chicago area.. let me know. I will hook you up ;)So the world is coming in for the kill so to speak.
